t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = input().strip()
    prev = a[0]
    ans = -1
    for i in a:
        if prev == i:
            ans += 1
        prev = i
    print(ans)

input=stdin.readline
t=int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    c=0
    n=int(input())
    s=input()
    for i in range(1,n):
        if s[i-1]==s[i]:
            c+=1
    print(c)

t=int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n=int(input())
    a=input()
    count=0
    i=0
    j=1
    while(i<n and j<n):
        if(a[i]==a[j]):
            count=count+1
        i=i+1
        j=j+1
    print(count)

t=int(input())

tc=int(input())
for t in range(tc):
    n=int(input())
    st=input()
    c=0
    for i in range(1,n):
        if st[i]==st[i-1]:
            i+=1
            c+=1
    print(c)
